properties.comment: UTF-8 sum.([0-9]*).name - name of the entry sum.([0-9]*).target.([0-9]*) - (may be ommited) Look at all transactions containing these accounts You can specify qualified names, unqualified names or ids sum.([0-9]*).source.([0-9]*) - of these accounts add all splits that refer to these accounts sum.([0-9]*).type = ONLYTO - sum only the ones that increase the balance of the account (other values: ONLYFROM, ALL) sum.([0-9]*).type = ONLYFROM - sum only the ones that decrease the balance of the account (other values: ONLYFROM, ALL) sum.([0-9]*).type = ALL - sum all the ones that increase or decreas the balance of the account (other values: ONLYFROM, ALL)
properties.entry: Root Account::Aktiva::B. Umlaufvermögen::II. Forderungen und sonstige Vermögensgegenstände
Root Account::Aktiva::B. Umlaufvermögen::IV. Kassenbestand, Bundesbankguthaben, Guthaben bei Kreditinstituten und Schecks
